column5: Well all I can say is we had one hell of a great time tonight my wife and I headed down to Windsor for the KISS show at the casino we had great floor seats a a great friend got for us but shortly after the show started we headed for front row and stayed there for the show what a great time KISS put on one hell of a show and did not stop they sure do know how to keep the Rock N Roll going enjoy some of the many great shots we took over the night.

Good stuff, I have been a huge fan since the late 70's, met most of them a few times to boot, pretty nice guys (for Rock Stars!) My 17 year old son is a fan as well- hoping they play more Ontario dates as I didn't want the hassle of trying to get him into Rama.
Great pics Mike!  I saw them at the Gardens many moons ago, with Ted Nugent opening!
Great stuff Mike.  Kiss was the first concert I ever went to (with my dad ugh) in Sudbury when I was about 10  Looks like you two had a great time.  Joey
I wonder if they will come up and play Yellowknife. For some reason almost all big name bands ignore us, go figure. The last big name band we got up here was The White Stripes.
Anyone got tickets for the rama show?
I have tickets for Rama, but they're for Stompin' Tom, not KISS.....
Those are some great shots, you must've had some really good tickets.  KISS show live would be awesome.
Glam Rock never caught on in the USA.  Them American's are some pretty smart people......  (Glad you had a great night out Mike ! )
Now theres a show I could get into. Always wanted to see Stompon Tom but never made it.
Awesome pics. I hear they put on a great show.
